225:1: duṣkaraśatasamudānīto'yamasmadarthaṃ tena bhagavatā saddharma iti satkṛtya śrotavyaḥ|
225:4: sa bālyātprabhṛtyeva bṛddhopāsanaratirvinayānurakto'nuraktaprakṛtiḥ prakṛtimedhāvitvādanekavidyādhigamavipulataramatirutsāhamaṃtraprabhāva[prabhutva]-śaktidaivasaṃpannaḥ svā iva prajāḥ prajāḥ pālayati sma|
225:8: alpātmanāṃ yā madireva lakṣmīrbabhūva sā tatra yathārthanāmā||2||
225:11: atha sa rājā dānapriyatvātsamantato nagarasya sarvopakaraṇadhanadhānyasamṛddhā dānaśālāḥ kārayitvā svamāhātmyānurūpaṃ yathābhiprāyasaṃpāditaṃ sopacāraṃ manoharamanatikrāntakālasubhagaṃ dānavarṣaṃ kṛtayugamegha iva vavarṣa|
225:15: atha tasya rājñaḥ pradānaudāryaśravaṇādvismitapramuditahṛdayā nānādigabhilakṣitadeśanivāsinaḥ puruṣāstaṃ deśamupajagmuḥ|
225:18: atha sa rājā samantataḥ samāpatato lābhāśāpramuditamanasaḥ pathikajananepathyapracchāditaśobhasya vanīpakajanasya
225:23: atha kadācitsa rājā dānaśālāḥ samanuvicaraṃstṛptatvādarthijanasya praviralaṃ yācakajanasaṃpātamabhisamīkṣya dānadharmasyānutsarpaṇānna tuṣṭimupajagāma|
225:24: tarṣa vininye'rthijanastametya na tvarthinaḥ prāpya sa dānaśauṇḍaḥ|
225:25: na hyasya dānavyavasāyamarthī yācñāpramāṇena śaśāka jetum||7||
225:26: tasya buddhirabhavat-atisabhāgyāste satpuruṣaviśeṣā ye visrambhaniryantraṇapraṇayamarthibhiḥ svagātrāṇyapi yācyante|
225:27: mama punaḥ pratyākhyānarūkṣākṣaravacanasaṃtarjita ivārthijano dhanamātrake'pragalbhapraṇayaḥ saṃvṛtta iti|
225:28: atha kṣitīśasya tamatyudāraṃ gātreṣvapi sveṣu nivṛttasaṅgam|
225:29: vijñāya dānāśrayiṇaṃ vitarkaṃ patipriyā strīva mahī cakampe||8||
225:30: atha śakro devendraḥ kṣititalacalanādakampite vividharatnaprabhodbhāsini sumerau parvatarāje kimidamiti samutpatitavitarkastasya rājña imaṃ vitarkātiśayaṃ dharaṇītalacalananimittamavetya vismayāvarjitahṛdayaścintāmāpede|
225:34: atha tasya rājñaḥ paṣaṃdi niṣaṇṇasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya samucitāyāṃ kṛtāyāmarthijanasya kaḥ kimicchatītyāhvānāvaghoṣaṇāyāmuddhāṭyamāneṣu kośādhyakṣādhisthiteṣu maṇikanakarajatadhananicayeṣu viśleṣyamāṇāsu puṭāsu vividhavasanaparipūrṇagarbhāsu samupāvartyamāneṣu vinītavividhavāhanaskandhapratiṣṭhitayugeṣu vicitreṣu yānaviśeṣeṣu pravṛttasaṃpāte'rthijane śakro devānāmindro vṛddhamandhaṃ brāhmaṇarūpamabhinirmāya rājñaścakṣuḥpathe prādurabhavat|
225:35: atha tasya rājñaḥ kārūṇyamaitrīparibhāvitayā dhīraprasannasaumyayā pratyudgata iva pariṣvakta iva ca dṛṣṭyā kenārtha ityupanimantryamāṇaḥ kṣitipānucarairnṛpatisamopamupetya jayāśīrvacanapuraḥsaraṃ rājānamityuvāca-
225:37: ekekṣaṇenāpi hi paṅkajākṣa gamyeta lokādhipa lokayātrā||10||
225:38: atha sa bodhisattvaḥ samamilaṣitamanorathaprasiddhyā paraṃ prītyutsavamanubhavan kisvididaṃ satyamevoktaṃ brāhmaṇena syāduta vikalpābhyāsānmayaivamavadhāritamiti jātavimarśaścakṣuryācñāpriyavacanaśravaṇatṛṣitamatistaṃ cakṣuryācanakamuvāca-
225:40: sudustyajaṃ cakṣuriti pravādaḥ saṃbhāvanā kasya mayi vyatītā||11||
225:41: atha sa brāhmaṇaveṣadhārī śakro devendrastasya rājña āśayaṃ viditvovāca-
225:44: atha sa rājā śakrasaṃkīrtanānnunamasya brāhmaṇasya bhavitrī devatānubhāvādanena vidhinā cakṣuḥsaṃpaditi matvā pramodaviśadākṣaramenamuvāca-
225:45: yenābhyupeto'si manorathena tameṣa te brāhmaṇa pūrayāmi|
225:49: syāt kiṃ nu so'yamuta neti vicāradolā-
225:53: prasīda deva mā maivaṃ na cakṣurdātumarhasi||15||
225:55: alaṃ śokāgninā dagdhuṃ sukhaṃ saṃvardhitāḥ prajāḥ||16||
225:57: rathān vinītāśca yujaḥ prayaccha madorjitaśrīlalitān dvipānvā||17||
225:59: gṛhāṇi sarvartusukhāni dehi mā dāḥ svacakṣurjagadekacakṣuḥ||18||
225:65: dhanameva yato dehi deva mā sāhasaṃ kṛthāḥ||20||
225:73: yadapi ceṣṭaṃ devatānubhāvādeva cakṣurasya kiṃ na saṃbhavatītyatra śrūyatām-
225:76: tanna me dānātiśayavyavasāye vidhnāya vyāyantumarhanti bhavanta iti|
225:77: amātyā ūcuḥ-dhanadhānyaratnāni devo dātumarhati na svacakṣuriti vijñāpitamasmābhiḥ|
225:79: yadeva yācyeta tadeva dadyānnānīpsitaṃ prīṇayatīha dattam|
225:81: atha tasya rājño dṛḍhataravisrambhapraṇayaḥ snehāvegādanapekṣitopacāro'mātyamukhyastaṃ rājānamityuvāca-mā tāvad bhoḥ !
225:83: yāmāsādya ca bhūribhirmakhaśataiḥ kīrti divaṃ cāpnuyāt|
225:85: kiṃ dṛṣṭvā nayane praditsati bhavānko'yaṃ kutastyo vidhiḥ||26||
225:87: narendracūḍādyutirañjitāṅghriḥ kiṃ lipsamāno nu dadāsi cakṣuḥ||27||
225:89: nāyaṃ yatnaḥ sārvabhaumatvamāptuṃ naiva svargaṃ nāpavargaṃ na kīrtim|
225:90: trātuṃ lokānityayaṃ tvādaro me yācñākleśo mā ca bhūdasya moghaḥ||28||
225:91: atha sa rājā nīlotpaladalaśakalarucirakānti nayanamekaṃ vaidyaparidṛṣṭena vidhinā śanakairakṣatamutpāṭya parayā prītyā cakṣuryācanakāya prāyacchat|
225:92: atha śakro devendrastādṛśamṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ cakre yathā dadarśa sa rājā saparijanastattasya cakṣuścakṣuḥsthāne pratiṣṭhitam|
225:93: athonmiṣitaikacakṣuṣaṃ cakṣuryācanakamabhivīkṣya sa rājā parameṇa praharṣeṇa samāpūrṇahṛdayo dvitīyamapyasmai nayanaṃ prāyacchat|
225:94: tataḥ sa rājā nayane pradāya vipadmapadmākaratulyavaktraḥ|
225:105: atha tasya rājñaḥ kramātsaṃrūḍhanayanavraṇasyāvagītapratanūbhūtāntaḥpurapaurajānapadaśokasya pravivekakāmatvādudyānapuṣkariṇyāstīre kusumabharāvanatarucirataruvaranicite mṛdusurabhiśiśirasukhapavane madhukaragaṇopakūjite paryaṅkeṇa niṣaṇṇasya śakro devendraḥ purastātprādurabhavat|
225:106: ka eṣa iti ca rājñā paryanuyukto'vravīt-
225:113: prabhūtaṃ me dhanaṃ śakra śaktimacca mahad balam|
225:116: mukhāni paśyāmi na yācakānāṃ yattena mṛtyurdayito mamendra||34||
225:120: imāmavasthāṃ gamitasya yācakaiḥ kathaṃ nu te saṃprati teṣu mānasam|
225:121: pracakṣva tattāvadalaṃ nigūhituṃ vrajeśca saṃpratyapanīya tāṃ yathā||35||
225:124: tadaiva caitarhi ca yācakānāṃ vacāṃsi yācñāniyatākṣarāṇi|
225:125: āśīrmayāṇīva mama priyāṇi yathā tathodetu mamaikamakṣi||36||
225:126: atha tasya rājñaḥ satyādhiṣṭhānabalāt puṇyopacayaviśeṣācca vacanasamanantaramevendranīlaśakalākrāntamadhyamiva nīlotpaladalasadṛśamekaṃ cakṣuḥ prādurabhavat|
225:127: prādurbhūṃte ca tasminnayanāścarye pramuditamanāḥ sa rājā punarapi śakramuvāca-
225:128: yaścāpi māṃ cakṣurayācataikaṃ tasmai mudā dve nayane pradāya|
225:130: athābhivyāhārasamanantarameva tasya rājño vispardhamānamiva tena nayanena dvitīyaṃ cakṣuḥ prādurabhavat|
225:131: tataścakampe sadharādharā dharā vyatītya velāṃ prasasāra sāgaraḥ|
225:133: prasādaramyaṃ dadṛśe vapurdiśāṃ rarāja śuddhyā śaradīva bhāskaraḥ|
225:136: vavau manojñātmaguṇaḥ samīraṇo manassu harṣo jagatāṃ vyajṛmbhata||40||
225:138: nṛpasya karmātiśayastavāśrayāḥ samantataḥ śuśruvire giraḥ śubhāḥ||41||
225:139: aho bataudāryamaho kṛpālutā viśuddhatā paśya yathāsya cetasaḥ|
225:142: amogharūpā bata puṇyasañcayāścirasya dharmeṇa khalūrjitaṃ jitam||43||
225:144: na no na vidito rājaṃstava śuddhāśayāśayaḥ|
225:145: evaṃ nu pratidatte te mayeme nayane nṛpa||44||
225:149: atha bodhisattvo vismayapūrṇamanobhirmandamandanimeṣapravikasitanayanairamātyairanuyātaḥ pauraiścābhivīkṣyamāṇo jayāśīrvacanapuraḥsaraiśca brāhmaṇairabhinandyamānaḥ puravaramucchritadhvajavicitrapatākaṃ pravitanyamānābhyudayaśobhamabhigamya parṣadi niṣaṇṇaḥ sabhājanārthamabhigatasyāmātyapramukhasya brāhmaṇavṛddhapaurajānapadasyaivamātmopanāyikaṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa-
225:150: ko nāma loke śithilādaraḥ syāt kartuṃ dhanenārthijanapriyāṇi|
225:157: loke parasminniha caiṣa panthāḥ kīrtipradhānasya sukhodayasya||49||
225:158: dhanasya niḥsāralaghoḥ sa sāro yaddīyate lokahitonmukhena|
225:160: tadevaṃ duṣkaraśatasamudānīto'yamasmadarthaṃ tena bhagavatā saddharma iti satkṛtya śrotavyaḥ|
225:161: tathāgatamāhātmye pūrvavacca karuṇāvarṇe'pi vācyam-ihaiva puṇyaphalapradarśane caivaṃ satkṛtyopacitāni puṇyānīhaiva puṣpamātramātmaprabhāvasya kīrtisaṃtatimanoharaṃ pradarśayantīti||
